Classes.name: Barbarian
Classes.description: The barbarian is a brutal berserker from beyond the edge of civilized lands.

Classes.name: Bard
Classes.description: The bard uses skill and spell alike to bolster his allies, confound his enemies, and build upon his fame.

Classes.name: Cleric
Classes.description: A devout follower of a deity, the cleric can heal wounds, raise the dead, and call down the wrath of the gods.

Classes.name: Druid
Classes.description: The druid is a worshiper of all things naturalâ€”a spellcaster, a friend to animals, and a skilled shapechanger.

Classes.name: Fighter
Classes.description: Brave and stalwart, the fighter is a master of all manner of arms and armor.

Classes.name: Monk
Classes.description: A student of martial arts, the monk trains his body to be his greatest weapon and defense.

Classes.name: Paladin
Classes.description: The paladin is the knight in shining armor, a devoted follower of law and good.

Classes.name: Ranger
Classes.description: A tracker and hunter, the ranger is a creature of the wild and of tracking down his favored foes.

Classes.name: Rogue
Classes.description: The rogue is a thief and a scout, an opportunist capable of delivering brutal strikes against unwary foes.

Classes.name: Sorcerer
Classes.description: The spellcasting sorcerer is born with an innate knack for magic and has strange, eldritch powers.

Classes.name: Wizard
Classes.description: The wizard masters magic through constant study that gives him incredible magical power.

Classes.name: Alchemist
Classes.description: The alchemist is the master of alchemy, using extracts to grant him great power, mutagens to enhance his form, and bombs to destroy his enemies.

Classes.name: Cavalier
Classes.description: Mounted upon his mighty steed, the cavalier is a brave warrior, using his wit, charm, and strength at arms to rally his companions and achieve his goals.

Classes.name: Inquisitor
Classes.description: Scourge of the unfaithful and hunter of horrors, the inquisitor roots out the enemies of her faith with grim conviction and an array of divine blessings.

Classes.name: Oracle
Classes.description: Drawing upon divine mysteries, the oracle channels divine power through her body and soul, but at a terrible price.

Classes.name: Summoner
Classes.description: Bonded to a mysterious creature called an eidolon, the summoner focuses his power on strengthing that connection and enhancing his strange, otherworldy companion.

Classes.name: Witch
Classes.description: Lurking on the fringe of civilization, the witch makes a powerful connection with a patron that grants her strange and mysterious powers through a special familiar.

Classes.name: Arcanist
Classes.description: Blending the power of the sorcerer with the versatility of the wizard, the arcanist draws upon a reservoir of power to bend magic to her will.

Classes.name: Bloodrager
Classes.description: Fusing the frenzy of the barbarian with the bloodline might of the sorcerer, the bloodrager calls upon innate power to give himself extraordinary abilities.

Classes.name: Brawler
Classes.description: Focusing on hand-to-hand combat, the brawler mixes the martial artistry of the monk with the specialist training of the fighter.

Classes.name: Hunter
Classes.description: Though both the druid and ranger can have animal companions, the hunter takes this bond to the next level, forming a deadly duo with her savage ally.

Classes.name: Investigator
Classes.description: With the rogue's cunning complemented by the alchemist's magical talent, the investigator is a peerless problem solver.

Classes.name: Shaman
Classes.description: Calling on the divine power of the oracle and the hexes of a witch, the shaman communes with her spirit animal to unleash doom upon her foes.

Classes.name: Skald
Classes.description: Sharing fury through song and deed, the skald takes the rage that lives in the heart of the barbarian and inspires it in others using the performances of the bard.

Classes.name: Slayer
Classes.description: Mixing the precise strikes of the rogue with the special training of the ranger, the slayer hunts down his foes with ruthless efficiency.

Classes.name: Swashbuckler
Classes.description: Combining the prowess of the fighter with the determination of the gunslinger, the swashbuckler is an acrobatic melee combatant.

Classes.name: Warpriest
Classes.description: Blending the cleric's divine might and the fighter's martial skills, the warpriest brings the fight to the enemies of his faith.

Classes.name: Battle Herald
Classes.description: A veteran whose masterful tactics and air of command inspire allies to greater feats of heroism.

Classes.name: Holy Vindicator
Classes.description: A pious warrior who spreads religion at the edge of a sword.

Classes.name: Horizon Walker
Classes.description: A scout and wanderer comfortable in even the strangest terrain.

Classes.name: Master Chymist
Classes.description: An alchemist whose mutagens create an alternate, brutish personality.

Classes.name: Master Spy
Classes.description: An espionage expert specializing in disguises and striking swiftly from the shadows.

Classes.name: Nature Warden
Classes.description: A master of the wilderness bonded spiritually to a fearsome animal companion.

Classes.name: Rage Prophet
Classes.description: A bold and barbaric champion who embraces otherworldly powers in order to perfect the art of combat.

Classes.name: Stalwart Defender
Classes.description: A master of defending territory and holding the line at all costs.
